# wood

## Documentation

- Download Doxygen: [http://www.doxygen.nl/download.html](http://www.doxygen.nl/download.html)
- Check install version: `doxygen -v`
- Install VSCode Doxygen package
- Run: `git submodule update --init --recursive`
